00097 OccupancyGrid::OccupancyGrid(int xDim, int yDim, int zDim, double resolution, const oryx_path_planning::Point& origin, const OccupancyGridCloud& cloud) throw(OccupancyGridAccessException):
00098                                                                                 origin_(origin),
00099                                                                                 occ_grid_((xDim+1)*(yDim+1)*(zDim+1),1),
00100                                                                                 converter_(resolution)
00101 {
00102         ROS_INFO("Generating new Point Cloud Based Occupancy Grid With Parameters: <%d, %d, %d>", xDim, yDim, zDim);
00103         ROS_INFO("Received cloud Should be Size <%d>, is size <%d>",(int)this->occ_grid_.size(), (int)cloud.size());
00104         this->x_dim_    = xDim;
00105         this->y_dim_    = yDim;
00106         this->z_dim_    = zDim;
00107         this->res_      = resolution;
00108         this->has_goal_ = false;
00109 
00110         for(unsigned int index = 0; index<cloud.size(); index++)
00111         {
00112                 //ROS_INFO("Extracted Data <%f, %f, %f, %x>", cloud.at(index).x, cloud.at(index).y, cloud.at(index).z, cloud.at(index).rgba);
00113                 setPoint(cloud.at(index), false);
00114                 //ROS_INFO("Set Data <%f, %f, %f, %x>", getPoint(cloud.at(index), false).x, getPoint(cloud.at(index), false).y, getPoint(cloud.at(index), false).z, getPoint(cloud.at(index), false).rgba);
00115         }
00116

00118 }

00149 OccupancyGrid::OccupancyGrid(const oryx_path_planning::OccupancyGridMsg& message):
00150                                                                         occ_grid_()
00151 {
00152         //extract grid information
00153         this->x_dim_    = message.x_dim;
00154         this->y_dim_    = message.y_dim;
00155         this->z_dim_    = message.z_dim;
00156         this->res_              = message.resolution;
00157 
00158         //extract origin data
00159         this->origin_.x = message.x_origin;
00160         this->origin_.y = message.y_origin;
00161         this->origin_.z = message.z_origin;
00162 
00163         //extract goal data
00164         if(message.has_goal)
00165         {
00166                 this->has_goal_ = true;
00167                 this->goal_.x   = message.x_goal;
00168                 this->goal_.y   = message.y_goal;
00169                 this->goal_.z   = message.z_goal;
00170         }
00171         else this->has_goal_ = false;
00172 
00173         //extract grid data
00174         pcl::fromROSMsg<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>(message.grid_data, this->occ_grid_);
00175 }

00177 void OccupancyGrid::intializeGrid(PointTrait_t seedTrait)
00178 {
00179         ROS_INFO("Grid Size:%d", (int)this->occ_grid_.size());
00180         for(int x=0; x<this->x_dim_+1; x++)
00181         {
00182                 for(int y=0; y<this->y_dim_+1; y++)
00183                 {
00184                         for(int z=0; z<this->z_dim_+1; z++)
00185                         {
00186                                 //ROS_INFO("Initializing Point <%d, %d, %d>", x,y,z);
00187                                 //Initialize the point
00188                                 //ROS_INFO("I'm Trying To Initialize Point %d,%d,%d, Index=%d", x,y,z, calcIndex(x,y,z));
00189                                 Point& point = getPoint(x,y,z);
00190                                 point.x = x-this->origin_.x;
00191                                 point.y = y-this->origin_.y;
00192                                 point.z = z-this->origin_.z;
00193                                 point.rgba = seedTrait;
00194                         }
00195                 }
00196         }
00197 }
00198 
00199 void OccupancyGrid::searchForGoal()
00200 {
00201         for(OccupancyGridCloud::iterator search_itr= this->occ_grid_.begin(); search_itr< this->occ_grid_.end(); search_itr++)
00202         {
00203                 if(search_itr->rgba==oryx_path_planning::GOAL)
00204                 {
00205                         this->goal_ = *search_itr;
00206                         this->has_goal_ = true;
00207                 }
00208         }
00209 }

00222 PointTrait OccupancyGrid::getPointTrait(Point point)const throw(OccupancyGridAccessException){
00223         point.getVector4fMap()+=this->origin_.getVector4fMap();
00224         if(boundsCheck(point)){
00225                 try{
00226                         return static_cast<oryx_path_planning::PointTrait>(getPoint(point).rgba);
00227                 }catch(std::exception& e){
00228                         throw *(new OccupancyGridAccessException(*(new std::string("Internal Point Cloud Problem!")), e));
00229                 }
00230         }
00231         return oryx_path_planning::UNKNOWN;
00232 }

00243 bool OccupancyGrid::setPointTrait(Point point, PointTrait trait)throw(OccupancyGridAccessException)
00244                                 {
00245         point.getVector4fMap()+=this->origin_.getVector4fMap();
00246         if(boundsCheck(point))
00247         {
00248                 try
00249                 {
00250                         oryx_path_planning::Point& setPoint = getPoint(point);
00251                         setPoint.rgba = trait;
00252                         if(trait==oryx_path_planning::GOAL)
00253                         {
00254                                 this->goal_ = setPoint;
00255                                 this->has_goal_ = true;
00256                         }
00257                         return true;
00258                 }
00259                 catch(std::exception& e)
00260                 {
00261                         throw *(new OccupancyGridAccessException(*(new std::string("Internal Point Cloud Problem!")), e));
00262                 }
00263         }
00264         return false;
00265                                 }

00267 const Point& OccupancyGrid::getGoalPoint() const throw (bool)
00268                                 {
00269         if(this->has_goal_)
00270         {
00271                 return this->goal_;
00272         }
00273         else throw false;
00274                                 }
00275 
00276 void OccupancyGrid::setGoalPoint(oryx_path_planning::Point point) throw(OccupancyGridAccessException)
00277                                 {
00278         point.rgba = oryx_path_planning::GOAL;
00279         try
00280         {
00281                 setPoint(point, false);
00282                 this->goal_ = point;
00283                 this->has_goal_ = true;
00284         }
00285         catch(std::exception& e)
00286         {
00287                 std::string message("Unable to Place Goal Point On Grid");
00288                 OccupancyGridAccessException error(message, e);
00289                 throw error;
00290         }
00291                                 }

00298 bool OccupancyGrid::generateMessage(sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Ptr message) const

00304 
00305 bool OccupancyGrid::generateMessage(oryx_path_planning::OccupancyGridMsg& message) const
00306 {
00307         message.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
00308         //Pack grid data
00309         message.x_dim = this->x_dim_;
00310         message.y_dim = this->y_dim_;
00311         message.z_dim = this->z_dim_;
00312         message.resolution  = this->res_;
00313         //Pack origin data
00314         message.x_origin = this->origin_.x;
00315         message.y_origin = this->origin_.y;
00316         message.z_origin = this->origin_.z;
00317         //pack goal data
00318         if(this->has_goal_)
00319         {
00320                 message.has_goal = true;
00321                 message.x_goal   = this->goal_.x;
00322                 message.y_goal   = this->goal_.y;
00323                 message.z_goal   = this->goal_.z;
00324         }
00325         else message.has_goal = false;
00326         //pack grid data
00327         pcl::toROSMsg<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>(this->occ_grid_, message.grid_data);
00328         return true;
00329 }

00331 bool OccupancyGrid::generateMessage(sensor_msgs::Image& message) const
00332 {
00333         try
00334         {
00335                 pcl::toROSMsg(this->occ_grid_, message);
00336         }
00337         catch(std::runtime_error& e)
00338         {
00339                 ROS_ERROR("Problem building an Image from the OccupancyGrid: %s", e.what());
00340                 return false;
00341         }
00342         return true;
00343 }

00397 boost::shared_ptr<std::string> OccupancyGrid::toString(int sliceAxis, int slice) const
00398 {
00399         boost::shared_ptr<std::string> output(new std::string(""));
00400         std::vector<std::string> occ_grid(this->x_dim_, std::string(this->y_dim_, ' '));
00401 
00402         char value[2] ={0,'\0'};
00403         for(int x=0; x<this->x_dim_; x++)
00404         {
00405                 for(int y=0; y<this->y_dim_; y++)
00406                 {
00407                         switch(getPoint(x, y, 0).rgba)
00408                         {
00409                         case UNKNOWN:
00410                                 value[0] = 'U';
00411                                 break;
00412                         case FREE_LOW_COST:
00413                                 value[0] = ' ';
00414                                 break;
00415                         case FREE_HIGH_COST:
00416                                 value[0] = '_';
00417                                 break;
00418                         case OBSTACLE:
00419                                 value[0] = 'X';
00420                                 break;
00421                         case GOAL:
00422                                 value[0] = 'G';
00423                                 break;
00424                         case INFLATED:
00425                                 value[0] = 'x';
00426                                 break;
00427                         case TENTACLE:
00428                                 value[0] = 'T';
00429                                 break;
00430                         case ROBOT:
00431                                 value[0] = 'R';
00432                                 break;
00433                         default:
00434                                 value[0] = '*';
00435                                 break;
00436                         }
00437                         occ_grid.at(x).replace(y,1,value);
00438                 }
00439         }
00440 
00441         for(unsigned int i=0;i<occ_grid.size(); i++)
00442         {
00443                 *output+=occ_grid.at(i);
00444                 *output+="\r\n";
00445         }
00446         return output;
00447 }

00449 int OccupancyGrid::calcIndex(int x, int y, int z) const
00450 {
00451         return x + (this->y_dim_+1) * (y + (this->z_dim_+1) * z);
00452 }
00453 
00454 const Point& OccupancyGrid::getPoint(const oryx_path_planning::Point& point, bool origin_corrected) const
00455 {
00456         if(origin_corrected)
00457         {
00458                 return this->occ_grid_.at(calcIndex(point.x, point.y, point.z));
00459         }
00460         else
00461         {
00462                 return this->occ_grid_.at(calcIndex(point.x+this->origin_.x, point.y+this->origin_.y, point.z+this->origin_.z));
00463         }
00464 }

00513 bool OccupancyGrid::boundsCheck(Point& point)const throw(OccupancyGridAccessException)
00514                                 {
00515         bool failure = false;
00516         const std::string prefex("Invalid Point Requested: ");
00517         const std::string middle(" Is Greater Than Max Value Or Less Than Zero: ");
00518         std::stringstream message("");
00519         if(point.x>this->x_dim_ || point.x<0)
00520         {
00521                 message<<prefex<<"X value"<<point.x<<middle<<this->x_dim_;
00522                 failure = true;
00523         }
00524         else if(point.y>this->y_dim_|| point.x<0)
00525         {
00526                 message<<prefex<<"Y value"<<point.y<<middle<<this->y_dim_;
00527                 failure = true;
00528         }
00529         else if(point.z>this->z_dim_|| point.x<0)
00530         {
00531                 message<<prefex<<"Z value"<<point.z<<middle<<this->z_dim_;
00532                 failure = true;
00533         }
00534         if(failure)
00535         {
00536                 std::string message_out(message.str());
00537                 OccupancyGridAccessException exception(message_out);
00538                 throw exception;
00539         }
00540         return true;
00541                                 }
00542 
00543 void OccupancyGrid::setPoint(Point& copy_point, bool origin_corrected)
00544 {
00545         Point& grid_point = getPoint(copy_point, origin_corrected);
00546         grid_point.x = copy_point.x;
00547         grid_point.y = copy_point.y;
00548         grid_point.z = copy_point.z;
00549         grid_point.rgba = copy_point.rgba;
00550         if(grid_point.rgba == oryx_path_planning::GOAL)
00551         {
00552                 this->goal_             = grid_point;
00553                 this->has_goal_ = true;
00554         }
00555 }
